The smoak of the Temple cleared, through the light of the Scripture· By the unworthiest of al the ministers of Christ Jo. Brayne. Brayne, John.
[8], 56 p.
Printed for Thomas Vere, at the upper end of the Old Bayley, London : MDCXLVIII. [1648]
Annotation on Thomason copy: "July 28". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
